acknowledgements: Thank you to all Chiefs for love and support over the past year.
Acknowledging passionate battles in KVK and cherished memories with tribes.
Expressing determination to make 'Viking Rise' a game worthy of long-term commitment and companionship.

core_gameplay_focus: Introduce a brand-new building and research system centered around the power of Dragon Crystal.
Roll out new KVK scenarios for more variety in seasonal gameplay.
Create fresh PVE content to enrich non-competitive experiences.
Expand the hero pool and skill system for more lineup compositions and strategic possibilities.
new_gameplay_and_events_unveiled: New PVE mode: [Abyssal Cavern] is in development.
New KVK and GVG modes drawing inspiration from Norse legends, featuring [Jormungand] and [RagnarÃ¶k].
Improve player experience for events, adding more engaging content and opportunities for free players.
Mount Skin feature incorporated into plans.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Can migration become more flexible and convenient with the increase in kingdoms?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: Will continue to expand migration group sizes and further reduce Migration Pass requirements.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Will there be further updates for city development for veteran players who completed current research/construction?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: Will continue to expand building and research content, presented as Dragon Crystal power.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Will Tribe permissions be readjusted to reduce R5 burden and improve Tribe management?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: Plans to reduce management burden for Tribe leadership, including subdividing Tribe title permissions.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Will more low-grade heroes be promoted to higher grades in the future, similar to Ivor?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: A new batch of purple hero grade promotions is already planned.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Can KVK Might matching be fairer?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: Continuously optimize KVK matching by fine-tuning metrics (Kingdom Might, personnel composition, historical performance) and addressing feedback.

frequent_concerns_addressed.question: Will the Drill Groundâ€™s functions be further expanded for battle simulation?
frequent_concerns_addressed.answer: Optimizing Drill Ground, including introducing more flexible team composition rules and buff/debuff mechanics.

raw_analysis.closing_remarks: Thank you for companionship and trust. Commitment to advance content and optimize the game with player help. Wishing Chiefs a great time in Viking Rise. See you in 2026!

major: The Kingdom Mayhem Conquest Season [Surtr's Flames] is about to begin. Flames roar in Muspelheim!
New Collaboration: Partnering with <How to Train Your Dragon>, let us embark on a Dragon Taming Journey!
Christmas Event: Carriage racing event and newly designed Christmas Skins.
new_features: Added monthly card [Lightshade Journey] (activates Tribe Auto-Assist).
Added a second Research queue (via Research Order Pack).
Optimized [Quick Upgrade] for Hero Talents and added [Quick Upgrade] for skills.
Added [Tribe Shop] - [Shard Market] to exchange Hero/Skill Shards.
Added [2025 Hero Skin Choice Chest I] to Tribe Day Treasure Hunt.
Added bulk donate function to Tribe Tech.
Added [Add Friend] feature when viewing other players' Chief Profile.
Added item quantity display bubbles in Inventory.
Added a save draft function for Chat (stored locally).
Added [Combat Settings] on mobile (Option to garrison after attacking).

optimizations.title: Events & Returning
items: Returning: 2024 Christmas series [Sparkling Holiday Night] set & [Snowy Deer's Shadow] flag.

optimizations.title: Blood Oath War
items: Legions reduced from 3 to 1 in Midgard Championship.
Garrisoned troops accumulate the same debuff as central buildings.
Ranking rules optimized: Ties are decided by higher total kill points.
Registration menu now clearly displays Legion member rules.

optimizations.title: UI & System
items: Added coordinate sharing function (share spaces, buildings, cities, troops, monsters).
Optimized display and performance of some pages.
Optimized [Speedup Queue] menu organization (Training, Research, Healing, Forge).
Optimized multi-troop selection logic for Marching.
Optimized display for [Wheel of Fortune] & [Skill Wheel] + added notification text.
Optimized interface for preset King's Decrees.
Optimized [Mail] sorting/cleanup and extended expiration times.
Optimized [Hall of Valor] interactions and performance.
Optimized [Language Settings]: Split into System Language and Chat Translation Language.
Optimized [Campaign] menu: Inactive events are hidden.
Collector overview: Now displays bonuses from skins with unlock attributes.
Optimized notification text after translating chat.
Hero Skin unlocking: No longer gifts 10 corresponding shards.

optimizations.title: Rewards
items: Conquest Season: Increased Recast Blades & adjusted Yggdrasil Dew distribution (Fenrir's Judgment, Hela's Curse, Baldr's Redemption, Alfheim's Defense).

fixes: Fixed an abnormal refresh issue in [Mail].
Fixed display issue with [Campaign - Drill Ground] on PC.
Fixed Hero Talents not taking effect in [Drill Ground].
Fixed forge progress display issue in [Equipment Forge].
Fixed avatar display issue when rallying neutral troops.
Fixed medium checkpoints display in [Hela's Curse].
Fixed text display issue in [Magic Card Blessing].
Fixed damage progress display in [Sworn Vengeance] ranking.
Fixed lag issue in [Magic Card Adventure].
Fixed display issue in [Time-Limited Migration] searches.

major: Die KÃ¶nigreich-Chaos Eroberungssaison [Surtrs Flammen] beginnt. Muspelheim brennt!
Neue Kollaboration: Gemeinsam mit <DrachenzÃ¤hmen leicht gemacht> auf Drachenjagd gehen!
new_features: Monatskarte [Lichtschatten-Reise] hinzugefÃ¼gt (Aktiviert Stamm Auto-Assistenz).
Zweite Forschungswarteschlange hinzugefÃ¼gt (via Forschungsauftrag-Paket).
Optimiertes [Schnell-Upgrade] fÃ¼r Talente und neu fÃ¼r Skills hinzugefÃ¼gt.
[Stamm-Shop] - [Splittermarkt] hinzugefÃ¼gt (Tausch von Helden/Skill-Splittern).
[2025 Helden-Skin-Auswahltruhe I] zur Stammestag-Schatzsuche hinzugefÃ¼gt.
Massenspende-Funktion fÃ¼r Stammestechnik hinzugefÃ¼gt.
[Freund hinzufÃ¼gen] Funktion im HÃ¤uptlingsprofil ergÃ¤nzt.
Mengenanzeige-Bubbles im Inventar hinzugefÃ¼gt.
Entwurf-Speicherfunktion fÃ¼r den Chat hinzugefÃ¼gt (lokal gespeichert).
[Kampfeinstellungen] auf Mobile: Option zum Garnisonieren nach Angriff hinzugefÃ¼gt.

optimizations.title: Events & RÃ¼ckkehr
items: RÃ¼ckkehr: Weihnachts-Serie 2024 [Funkelnde Weihnachtsnacht] Set & [Schneehirsches Schatten] Flagge.

optimizations.title: Bluteid-Krieg (Optimiert)
items: Legionen in der Midgard-Meisterschaft von 3 auf 1 reduziert.
Garnisonstruppen sammeln nun denselben Debuff wie zentrale GebÃ¤ude.
Ranglistenregeln optimiert: Bei Gleichstand entscheiden hÃ¶here Kill-Punkte.
AnmeldemenÃ¼ zeigt nun klar die Regeln fÃ¼r Legionsmitglieder.

optimizations.title: UI & System
items: Koordinaten-Teilen Funktion hinzugefÃ¼gt (fÃ¼r leere FlÃ¤chen, GebÃ¤ude, StÃ¤dte, Truppen, Monster).
Anzeige und Performance einiger Seiten optimiert.
[Beschleunigungs-Warteschlange] neu organisiert (Training, Forschung, Heilung, Schmiede).
Multi-Truppen-Auswahl beim Marschieren optimiert.
Anzeige fÃ¼r [GlÃ¼cksrad] und [Skill-Rad] optimiert + Hinweistext.
Interface fÃ¼r KÃ¶nigserlasse-Voreinstellungen optimiert.
[Post]: Sortierung/Bereinigung optimiert, Ablaufzeit verlÃ¤ngert.
[Halle der Tapferkeit]: Interaktionen und Performance verbessert.
[Spracheinstellungen]: Unterteilt in System- und Chat-Ãœbersetzungssprache.
[Kampagne]: Inaktive Events werden im MenÃ¼ ausgeblendet.
Sammler-Ãœbersicht: Zeigt nun Boni von Skins mit Freischalt-Attributen korrekt an.
Hinweistext nach Chat-Ãœbersetzung optimiert.
Helden-Skin Freischaltung: Es werden keine 10 Splitter mehr geschenkt.

optimizations.title: Belohnungen
items: Eroberungssaison: Mehr Umschmiede-Klingen & angepasste Menge an Yggdrasil-Tau (Fenrir, Hela, Baldr, Alfheim).

fixes: Refresh-Problem in der [Post] behoben.
Anzeigefehler beim [Drill Ground] Eingang (PC Version) behoben.
Fehler behoben, dass Heldentalente im [Drill Ground] nicht wirksam waren.
Anzeigefehler beim Schmiedefortschritt in der [AusrÃ¼stungsschmiede] behoben.
Avatar-Anzeigefehler beim Sammeln neutraler Truppen behoben.
Anzeigefehler bei mittleren Checkpoints in [Hela's Curse] behoben.
Textanzeigefehler in [Magic Card Blessing] behoben.
Schadensfortschritts-Anzeige im [Sworn Vengeance] Ranking behoben.
Lag-Probleme im [Magic Card Adventure] behoben.
Anzeigefehler bei der Suche nach KÃ¶nigreichen in [Zeitlich begrenzter Migration] behoben.
